title: 22 Oct 2015 Stories Untold-What happened in schools during the Occupy Movement 2014 (The University ...
text: ( Source : The University of Hong Kong ) Back 22 Oct 2015 The 2014 Occupy Movement was an unprecedented event in terms of its duration, scale and impact. Started on September 28 and ended with a clearance operation at the Admiralty occupy site
